TopicTitle: Dman1791's Jets and Replicas (Currently only the PAK-FA) (Pictures coming SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢)

Articles.Content:
Note: Most craft will use BDArmory, QuizTech Aerospace, and, for Russian (or Russian-inspired) aircraft, the P.E.W. expansion for BDArmory.

[PAK-KA (PAK-FA AKA T-50)](http://kerbalx.com/Dman1791/PAK-KA)

This is the first craft I've made that I deemed worthy of being posted. It's highly maneuverable and carries a heavy AA armament. I had to use a few tricks with tweakscale and what could have been a bug in MFT to get high capacity, low size fuel tanks. Darn fuel-guzzling turbos! This is my favorite of the craft I've built. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Feedback is much appreciated!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T04:48:24Z" title="08/13/2015 04:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by Dman1791**
I would love **GIANT** bombers, I have not seen a lot of them here.
